questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子中有兩個錯誤：1. 'is' 應該改為 'are'，因為主語 'They' 是複數；2. 'on London' 應該改為 'to London'，表示目的地。正確的句子應該是 'They are planning to travel to London next week.'
questionData.instruction: Identify the error(s) in the sentence above and rewrite it correctly.
questionData.original_sentence: They is planning to travel on London next week.
standard_corrections: They are planning to travel to London next week.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子中有一個詞形錯誤：'communicate' 是動詞，這裡需要名詞 'communicator' 或形容詞 'communicative'。如果用名詞，需要冠詞 'a'；如果用形容詞，則不需要冠詞 'a'。正確的句子可以是 'She is a very good communicator.' 或 'She is very communicative.'
questionData.instruction: Identify the error(s) in the sentence above and rewrite it correctly.
questionData.original_sentence: She is a very good communicate.
standard_corrections: She is a very good communicator.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子中有兩個錯誤：1. 'One of the...' 結構後面的名詞應該是複數，所以 'student' 應該改為 'students'；2. 主語是 'One' (單數)，所以動詞應該是單數 'was'，而不是複數 'were'。正確的句子應該是 'One of the students was absent today.'
questionData.instruction: Identify the error(s) in the sentence above and rewrite it correctly.
questionData.original_sentence: One of the student were absent today.
standard_corrections: One of the students was absent today.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子中有兩個錯誤：1. 情態動詞 'should' 後面應該直接跟動詞原形，所以 'to practice' 應該改為 'practice'；2. 'practice' 後面通常跟動名詞，所以 'to speak' 應該改為 'speaking'。正確的句子應該是 'You should practice speaking English every day.'
questionData.instruction: Identify the error(s) in the sentence above and rewrite it correctly.
questionData.original_sentence: You should to practice to speak English every day.
standard_corrections: You should practice speaking English every day.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子中有一個比較級錯誤：形容詞 'tall' 是單音節詞，其比較級形式應該是 'taller'，而不是 'more tall'。正確的句子應該是 'He is taller than his brother.'
questionData.instruction: Identify the error(s) in the sentence above and rewrite it correctly.
questionData.original_sentence: He is more tall than his brother.
standard_corrections: He is taller than his brother.
